articles.title: US, European and UK diplomats meet to encourage Australia to ramp up climate action - The Guardian Australia
articles.description: Exclusive: Diplomats have had multiple meetings in Canberra to discuss ways to engage with Australia on setting stronger climate targets
articles.content:
European, British and American diplomats have met up to three times in Canberra over recent months to discuss how to encourage Australia to consider stronger cuts to its greenhouse gas emissions.
